summary: The lives of 6 people over 35 in Rouen, France, and their relationship to each other.
cast: Anne Alvaro|Jean-Pierre Bacri|Alain Chabat|Agnès Jaoui|Gérard Lanvin|Christiane Millet|Wladimir Yordanoff|Anne Le Ny|Brigitte Catillon|Raphaël Dufour|Xavier de Guillebon|Camille Andraca|Céline Arnaud|Robert Bacri|Marie Agnès Brigot|Michel Caccia|Désir Carré|Claude Crétient|Scali Delpeyrat|Jérôme Huguet|Sam Karmann|Gaël Klein|Cécile Partouche|Bob Zaremba|Bérangère Bailleul|Vanessa Chassaigne|Stanislas de la Tousche|Catherine Dewitt|Vincent Fouquet|Marie-Hélène Garnier|Réginald Huguenin|Marc Le Gall|Jean-François Levistre|Didier Mahieu|Maryse Ravera|Laurent Savalle|Jean-Marc Talbot|Jean-Pierre Darroussin
title: Para todos los gustos
